data.title: Struggling With High Electricity Bills? Try Heating Your House With Bitcoin – These Americans Are Doing It
data.description: As colder weather sets in, most Americans are lighting their fireplaces and turning on their electric heaters to stay warm. But there are a handful who have opted for a new, cost-effective way to heat their homes: bitcoin mining rigs. The computing ...
data.keywords: bitcoin mining, cryptocurrency, potential energy, Andrew Sobko
